labels.name: back from acceptance
labels.description: Rejected by PM Acceptance.

labels.name: code quality
labels.description: Refactor, abstraction, etc.

labels.name: UI
labels.description: UI issues reported after the feature is done.

labels.name: reported by client
labels.description: To indicate that the issue is raised by client.

labels.name: reported by team
labels.description: To indicate that the issue is raised by internal team members.

labels.name: reported by qa
labels.description: To indicate that the issue is raised by QA.

labels.name: bug/critical
labels.description: 70% users will notice a feature broken, fix immediately.

labels.name: bug/major
labels.description: 70% users will be affected by the issue, or any feature broken, fix asap.

labels.name: bug/minor
labels.description: 20% users will be affected by the issue, fix optionally.

labels.name: bug/trivial
labels.description: < 20% users will be affected by the issue, fix optionally.

labels.name: ui/critical
labels.description: UI issues that will affect the look and feel impression of almost all users.

labels.name: ui/major
labels.description: UI issues that will affect the look and feel impression of > 70% users.

labels.name: ui/minor
labels.description: UI issues that will affect the look and feel impression of > 20% users.

labels.name: ui/trivial
labels.description: UI issues that will affect the look and feel impression of < 20% users.

labels.name: clarification
labels.description: Pending for clarification.

labels.name: clarified
labels.description: This is clarified.

labels.name: research
labels.description: Study / Research for something to reduce uncertainty.

labels.name: doc
labels.description: Documentation.

labels.name: security
labels.description: Security feature, issue or enhancement.

labels.name: optimization
labels.description: Improve performance.

labels.name: testing
labels.description: Unit test, integration test, load test.

labels.name: idea
labels.description: Good to have but not in the plan, we may consider it later.

labels.name: design
labels.description: Question or request that require designer attention.

labels.name: user story
labels.description: Meta issue that describe a requirement and/or goal.
